gassed adjective
(EXCITED)
UK very excited: I'm so gassed about my party on Saturday. How gassed were you when you realized you'd won?

gassed adjective
(TIRED)
US extremely tired: He was gassed after an 80 minute bike ride. I'd only run a mile but was totally gassed.
